sentences.en: Dial get online to say, begin since thenceforth faddish.
sentences.cn: 拨号上网一说, 从那时起开始风行.

sentences.en: There was , to be sure, a faddish aspect to this enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 在这个热潮中, 肯定有赶时髦的成分.

sentences.en: We ate at a faddish new restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家新开张的时尚餐馆吃饭。

words.tran_cn: 时尚；一时的爱好；一时流行的狂热

trans.tran_cn: 好赶时髦的，一时流行的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as faddish, you mean that it has no real value and that it will not remain popular for very long
